text: Peter Briggs (born 23 February 1992) is a badminton player from England. In 2019, he started to represent Canada. == Achievements == === BWF Grand Prix (1 title) === The BWF Grand Prix has two levels, the BWF Grand Prix and Grand Prix Gold. It is a series of badminton tournaments sanctioned by the Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007. Men's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Year ! Tournament !
